attributes.action: Include a "NONE OF THE ABOVE" option on ballot papers
attributes.additional_details: Because without this there is no real choice

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure what you'd like the result of people voting 'none of the above' to be on the outcome of an election. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
